\version "2.20.0"
\language "english"

\include "/home/marc/.local/share/SCAMP/scamp_lilypond_template.ly"
\header {}
\score
{
    \new Score
    <<
        \context Staff = "Violin"
        \with
        {
            instrumentName = #"Violin"
        }
        {
            <<
                \context Voice = "voiceOne"
                {
                    \time 4/4
                    \times 2/3
                    {
                        \clef "treble"
                        cs'8
                        (
                        \(
                        - \abjad-dashed-line-with-hook
                        - \tweak bound-details.left.text \markup \concat { "intensely" \hspace #0.5 }
                        \startTextSpan
                        d'8
                        e'8
                        )
                    }
                    \times 2/3
                    {
                        cs'8
                        (
                        d'8
                        e'8
                        )
                    }
                    \times 2/3
                    {
                        f'8
                        \<
                        (
                        e'8
                        d'8
                        )
                    }
                    \times 2/3
                    {
                        f'8
                        (
                        e'8
                        d'8
                        \stopTextSpan
                        )
                    }
                }
                \context Voice = "TempoVoice"
                {
                    \tempo 4=60
                    s1
                }
            >>
            <<
                \context Voice = "voiceOne"
                {
                    g'2
                    \f
                    \tweak bound-details.left.text \markup{ \musicglyph #"scripts.trill" \raise #0.65 \teeny \flat } \startTrillSpan
                    f'4
                    e'4
                    \)
                    \stopTrillSpan
                }
            >>
        }
        \context Staff = "Piano"
        \with
        {
            instrumentName = #"Piano"
        }
        {
            <<
                \context Voice = "voiceOne"
                {
                    \time 4/4
                    \clef "bass"
                    a,,8
                    \sustainOn
                    - \tweak bound-details.left.text \markup \concat { cresc. \hspace #0.5 }
                    - \tweak bound-details.left-broken.text \markup { (cresc.) }
                    _ \startTextSpan
                    a,8
                    e8
                    a8
                    d,8
                    \sustainOff
                    \sustainOn
                    d8
                    f8
                    a8
                    \stopTextSpan
                }
            >>
            <<
                \context Voice = "voiceOne"
                {
                    <g, d bf>2
                    \f
                    \arpeggio
                    \>
                    \sustainOff
                    <a, cs a>2
                    \fermata
                    \!
                    \arpeggio
                    \bar "|."
                }
            >>
        }
    >>
}
